Half-Normal plot

Function plotHalfNormal...

plotHalfNormal(object, score = TRUE, quant.scale = FALSE,
  xlab = "Half-Normal Quantiles", ylab = "Residuals", main = "", ...)

Arguments

object

fitted model object or numeric vector
score

if TRUE score based on probability density function
quant.scale

if TRUE values on avis are on quantile scale
xlab

the text for the x axis
ylab

the text for the y axis
main

title of plot
...

extra arguments passed to hnp.

Value

An object of class ggplot

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
